title: Microsoft gives free Copilot AI services to US government workers
description:
Millions of US federal government workers are about to get a new AI assistant on their devices for free in the form of Microsoft Copilot. The move is part of a deal between Microsoft and the US General Services Administration (GSA) that’s also expected to save taxpayers $3.1 billion in its first year. The centrepiece […]

title: Marketing AI boom faces crisis of consumer trust
description:
The vast majority (92%) of marketing professionals are using AI in their day-to-day operations, turning it from a buzzword into a workhorse. title: AI security wars: Can Google Cloud defend against tomorrow’s threats?
description:

title: Agentic AI: Promise, scepticism, and its meaning for Southeast Asia
description:
Agentic AI is being talked about as the next major wave of artificial intelligence, but its meaning for enterprises remains to be settled. Yet adoption is still limited: only 2% of organisations have scaled its use, and […]

title: Tencent Hunyuan Video-Foley brings lifelike audio to AI video
description:
A team at Tencent’s Hunyuan lab has created a new AI, ‘Hunyuan Video-Foley,’ that finally brings lifelike audio to generated video. It’s designed to listen to videos and generate a high-quality soundtrack that’s perfectly in sync with the action on screen. Ever watched an AI-generated video and felt like something was missing? title: What Rollup News says about battling disinformation
description:

title: Google Vids gets AI avatars and image-to-video tools
description:

title: Zopa: AI to automate banking, threaten finance jobs
description:
AI is transforming the banking industry, but the expected benefits and savings come at great human cost with the impact on finance jobs. title: Decentralised AI: Full of promise, but not without challenges
description:
Decentralised artificial intelligence has been hailed as one of the most profound innovations of our time, promising to give users control of the most transformative technologies. description:

title: X and xAI sue Apple and OpenAI over AI monopoly claims
description:
